data.title: Buenos Aires The Capital of Argentina
data.meta_description: We take you to the Buenos Aires most tourist services dont, a place where soul, sensuality and passion reflects every aspect of the Porteno life. Go see it now and enjoy
data.text:
Buenos Aires is the capital of Argentina and its largest city and port. It is located on the southern shore of the Rio de la Plata on the south eastern coast of the American continent.

The name means fair winds in Spanish. It is one of the largest cities in Latin America, with a lot of cultural offerings, and is the point of departure for travelling to the rest of the country.

The climate of Buenos Aires is mild all year round. The mean annual temperature is 18 making extremely hot and cold days very infrequent. Thus, visitors can enjoy walking around the city in any season.

The official language is Spanish. The portenos easily understand persons who speak Italian and Portuguese. Most people involved in tourist activities speak English.

Whether youre coming to Buenos Aires city on business or as a tourist, enjoy the great location and get the feeling of a genuine cosmopolitan city.

It is a modern, dynamic and radiant city that features the European architecture of its founders and absorbs the passion of its people in people of the port.

Considered the Pearl of South America, Buenos Aires has an intense cultural life where tango, long coffee klatches and football are essential elements in its people daily lives.

If you are a fan of walking in open green spaces and parks in big cities like Buenos Aires, be sure not to miss a promenade in Palermo, a beautiful area in the eastern part of the city. Here you will not only find open spaces to walk in, but a large lake where you can rent paddle boats and an immense flower garden with free entry

Buenos Aires tourist offer revolves around the history, reflected in the French and Italian architecture, with numerous museums, theatres, cultural centres and shopping malls. The rural tourism invites to the performance of activities typical from the countryside and hunting, with accommodation in ancient estancia quarters and the possibility to breathe the pure air of the plains while we taste the traditional Creole barbecue.

We acknowledge the travellers who trail off the beaten path in hopes to find the heart of the place theyre in, and in doing so have created a unique service. We take you to the Buenos Aires most tourist services dont, a place where soul, sensuality and passion reflects every aspect of the Porteno life. Go see it now and enjoy.
